Plot: IS THAT YOU? Is the story of RONNIE, 60 year old Israeli film projectionist, who has been fired from his job and is going now to the U.S. in a search for RACHEL, the love of his youth IS ...
Title: Is That You?
Writer: Rod Barr (story), Yaron Kaver (script translation), Dani Menkin (story), Dani Menkin, Nathan Rickard (additional writer), Tanya Schiller (script supervisor)
Actors: Alon Aboutboul, Rani Blair, Bruce Cole-Edwards, Navroz N. Dabu
